data.eml:eml: Two new deep­water species of Caecoserolis Wägele, 1994 (Isopoda, Sphaeromatidea, Serolidae) from off North Island, New Zealand *

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bruce, Niel L. (2008): Two new deep­water species of Caecoserolis Wägele, 1994 (Isopoda, Sphaeromatidea, Serolidae) from off North Island, New Zealand *. Zootaxa 1866: 453-466, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.183897
